## [0.1.0](https://github.com/liblaf/api/releases/tag/v0.1.0) - 2025-06-02

### üí• BREAKING CHANGES

- **(api)** The mihomo subscription endpoint
  now uses /subscribe/{filename}?id={uuid} format
  instead of /{uuid}/{filename}. Update clients to
  use new URL structure and parameter location. - [0a64622](https://github.com/liblaf/api/commit/0a6462278033f6a5cc1b987eb83120a69fb2fa48) by [@liblaf](https://github.com/liblaf)
